contact.contact-us.form.subject: Enter Subject
contact.faq.title: FAQ
contact.faq.answer-one: For countertops, we use solid surface materials, an acrylic-based material made of natural minerals. While for storage, we use Laminate Bonded Chipboards.
contact.faq.question-two: I cannot decide on my design choice. Can I see the actual products and color samples?
contact.faq.answer-two.point-one: Absolutely! Visit our showroom and we will be happy to help you with your design requirements.
contact.faq.question-three: How do I clean and maintain my vanity?
contact.faq.answer-three.point-two: Our countertop can be cleaned with just soap and water, no special cleaners required. It has a 100% waterproof feature which helps in preventing the growth of mold, mildew, and bacteria. It has a seamless design with no visible joints so dirt cannot get trapped in any gaps. Plus, it is designed with a coved backsplash that prevents water from pooling at the edge, further reducing the chance of dirt buildup.
contact.faq.answer-three.point-three: Our storage does not require any special care due to their resistant, hygienic and dense surface. It has an Antibacterial surface property that makes it suitable for your bathrooms. To maintain it, do not use abrasive and scouring agents for cleaning. Use soft and clean paper wipes (dry or damp) or a sponge. If cleaning with a damp cloth, wipe dry afterwards.
contact.faq.question-four: How do I track my orders?
contact.faq.answer-four: To check your order status, please visit our orders page and enter your reference number. If you have an account, simply log in to view your order history. Feel free to reach out to us directly for assistance with your order.
contact.faq.question-five: Can I change my order or cancel it?
contact.faq.answer-five.point-one: Our team will contact you right after you place your order. We will re-confirm your order details. In case of design assistance needed, we have a qualified team to provide free design consultation. We want to make sure that the Cabina products you have selected are the best match for your spaces
contact.faq.answer-five.point-two: For cancellation, it may be possible to cancel but this is not guaranteed and would need to be checked on a case-by-case basis. In such circumstances, please contact our support team.
contact.faq.question-six: Do you sell for commercial projects?
contact.faq.answer-six.point-one: Yes, we definitely accommodate commercial projects. Cabina offers a variety of selections that are designed to perfectly suit your offices, hotels, restaurants, retail and other spaces
contact.faq.answer-six.point-two: With a fully equipped factory and extensive production capacity, our experienced engineering team and skilled carpenters excel at handling large-scale orders. With over 20 years of proven success in executing bathroom fit-out projects, we are here to assist you with design, customization, and installation tailored to your specific needs
contact.faq.question-seven: Do you export to international markets?
contact.faq.answer-seven: Yes, we do export our Cabina products. We encourage you to contact us directly for comprehensive information regarding your specific order. Our team can assist you with all aspects, including a detailed pricing breakdown, freight arrangements, estimated lead times for delivery, and packaging options to ensure your products arrive safely.
